org.icepdf.core.pobjects.fonts

Interface FontFile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFont

    public interface FontFile
    Font file interfaces. Common methods which encapsulate NFont and OFont font rendering libraries.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FontFile.ByteEncoding
      Possible encoding format of string that was designed to work with this font.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long LAYOUT_NONE

      • canDisplayEchar

        boolean canDisplayEchar(char ech)
        Can the character ch in the nfont's encoding be rendered?
        Parameters:
        ech - character to test for displayability.
        Returns:
        true if renderable, false otherwise.

      • setIsCid

        void setIsCid()

      • deriveFont

        FontFile deriveFont(float pointsize)
        Creates nfont a new pointsize, assuming 72 ppi. Note to subclassers: you must make a complete independent instance of the nfont here, even if point size and everything else is the same, as other deriveFont methods use this to make a clone and might make subsequent changes.
        Parameters:
        pointsize - point size of font.
        Returns:
        fontFile with associated point size.

      • getToUnicode

        CMap getToUnicode()

      • toUnicode

        String toUnicode(String displayText)

      • toUnicode

        String toUnicode(char displayChar)

      • getFamily

        String getFamily()
        Returns name of nfont, such as "Times".
        Returns:
        font family of font.

      • getSize

        float getSize()

      • getAscent

        double getAscent()
        Returns maximum ascent glyphs above baseline.
        Returns:
        fonts ascent.

      • getDescent

        double getDescent()
        Returns maximum descent of glyphs below baseline.
        Returns:
        fonts descent

      • getMaxCharBounds

        Rectangle2D getMaxCharBounds()
        Returns left in rectangle's x, ascent in y, width in width, height in height.
        Returns:
        max character bounds.

      • getTransform

        AffineTransform getTransform()
        Returns a copy of the transform associated with this font file.
        Returns:
        fonts transform matrix.

      • getRights

        int getRights()
        Returns nfont usage rights bit mask.
        Returns:
        fonts permission/rights.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns name of nfont, such as "Times-Roman", which is different than the filename.
        Returns:
        font name

      • isHinted

        boolean isHinted()
        Returns true iff nfont has hinted outlines, which is Type 1 and TrueType is a sign of higher quality.
        Returns:
        true if the font is hinted, otherwise false.

      • getNumGlyphs

        int getNumGlyphs()
        Returns number of glyphs defined in nfont.
        Returns:
        number of glyphs in font.

      • getStyle

        int getStyle()
        Gests the fonts's style.
        Returns:
        font style

      • getSpaceEchar

        char getSpaceEchar()
        Returns the character that seems to be used as a space in the current encoding, or NOTDEF_CHAR if no such character.
        Returns:
        associated space character.

      • getEstringBounds

        Rectangle2D getEstringBounds(String estr,
                             int beginIndex,
                             int limit)

      • getFormat

        String getFormat()
        Returns primary format, such as "Type1" or "OpenType".
        Returns:
        "Type1" or "OpenType"

      • drawEstring

        void drawEstring(Graphics2D g,
                 String estr,

                 long layout,

      • getEstringOutline

        Shape getEstringOutline(String estr,
                        float x,
                        float y)
        Get the glyph outline shape for the given estr translated to x,y.
        Parameters:
        estr - text to calculate glyph outline shape
        x - x coordinate to translate outline shape.
        y - y coordinate to translate outline shape.
        Returns:
        glyph outline of the estr.

      • getByteEncoding

        FontFile.ByteEncoding getByteEncoding()

      • getSource

        URL getSource()
        Gets the source url of the underlying file if any. Embedded fonts will not have a source.
        Returns:
        null if the font is embedded, otherwise the font system path.
